summary: This mod adds some craftable 'Chitin Goggles' to the game of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3545/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/MFH9yvd.png[/img][/url][line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jFfTTET.png[/img]
This mod adds the craftable [color=#f4a460][size=4][b]'Chitin Goggles'[/b][/size][/color] to the game of Skyrim


[size=5][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] Requires Skyrim v1.8 + Dragonborn DLC [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]

[size=4][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] FULL Beast race support [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]


- Uses Slot [color=#f4a460][b][#56][/b][/color] -


[youtube]Ysn1mQ4mZEQ[/youtube]
Many thanks to insane0hflex for the mod spotlight[/center][line]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/vnyj7Ev.jpg[/img]
Made with [b]isoku's[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31968/][b]'Wet and Cold - Ashes'[/b][/url] mod in mind, these are a stark alternative for the inhabitants of Solstheim to wear during ash storms. These Goggles will protect players eyes from the ash storms while wearing them.
No fancy effects or scripting with these this time, go download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13133][size=3][b]Dwemer Goggles and Scouter[/b][/size][/url] if you want that.

I've given [b]FULL[/b] permission for isoku to use the meshes and textures of this mod, for use in Wet and Cold - Ashes.[/center][line]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Brwj4.png[/img]
You can craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Chitin Goggles'[/b][/color] using any [color=#f4a460][b]'Forge'[/b][/color] under the [color=#f4a460][b]'Chitin'[/b][/color] section.


To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Chitin Goggles'[/b][/color], you will need:
[list][*] 1 Netch Leather
[*] 1 Corundum Ingot
[*] 2 Chitin Plate
[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/iZy5l.png[/img]
[list][*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the [b]'ChitinGoggles.esp'[/b] file is active in the [b]Data[/b] section of your [b]SkyrimLauncher.exe.[/b]
[/list]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/JJ6mB.png[/img]
[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Reworked Textures
- Halved mesh Glossiness
[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release
- Adds craftable [b]'Chitin Goggles'[/b] to the game


[line]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3575696][img]http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/4806/do5u0o5w2zbg8ci4g.jpg[/img][/url]
Many thanks to user [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3575696][b]brokefoot[/b][/url] supplying the images for the mod page. His screenshots on the image section are some of the best, go check them out![/center][line]
